content.prompt: Which of the following explains a continuity in the effect of technological innovation on the production of goods in the late 1800s?

choices.label: Improved manufacturing practices gradually reduced reliance on immigrant workers.
Improved quality of manufacturing steadily decreased demand for consumer goods.
New types of transportation increasingly shifted industrial centers from the North to the South.
New industrial machines increased the number of goods that factories could make.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
